title: Drinky Bird Project
description: Craft your drinks and find a bar.

title: Eat-Da-Burger!
description: This project allows the user to enter the burgers they want to eat into the SQL database and then 'Devour' them at the click of a button. The application is deployed on Heroku with the user's 'burger' content saved in a database.

title: Nutrition Journal Project 2
builtWith: Node.js, Express.js, SQL, Sequelize, Passport.js, Handlebars

title: Weather Dashboard
description: This weather dashboard will allow the user to search for a city and displays the current weather conditions and a 5 day forecast. This project also will save the search history for up to 5 cities.

title: Work Day Scheduler
description: This day scheduler allows the user to save important tasks to a specific time slot. The hour is color coded to represent whether the time is in the past, present, or future.
